summary: In this compelling film, Dr. Wayne W. Dyer explores the spiritual journey from ambition to meaning.
cast: Wayne Dyer|Portia de Rossi|Edward Kerr|Michael DeLuise|Ron Marasco|Shannon Sturges|Maury Sterling|Ethan Lipton|Molly Bryant|Don Franklin|Ron Garcia|Karen Kondazian|Ethan Kelley|Jack Kelley|Joel Virgel|Clyde J. Bruff|Austin Highsmith|D. Scott McQuiston|Louise Hay|Suzanne Keilly|Marco Sanchez|John Paul Goorjian|Jamaal Bradshaw|Darius Le Gall|Jennifer Austin|Matthew Riutta|Loretta Hintz|Al Marcotte|Rick LeCompte|Eben Levy|Vito Dieterle|Ian Riggs|Gabi DuBay|Douglas S. Matthews|William Morris
director: Director: Michael A. Goorjian (as Michael Goorjian)
title: Ambition to Meaning: Finding Your Life's Purpose
